posts.post_content:
I have obtained the T206 Foster I needed to complete my T206 set  :) 

Thanks for your time and best regards,
Craig

just had to wish you the best at this most exciting moment in the taming of the
Monster.

best,

barry

Wish I could help but this is as close I got:
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/bbbofsfirstclass/holygrailcards/websize/T211%20Red%20Sun%20Foster1.jpg[/IMG]
No worries.  I am sure Foster will appear soon.  Congratulations on your great accomplishment.

To echo David's comments above...congrats on the accomplishment.  Foster is tough but not as tough as some of the others that you have acquired.  I actually had two nice ones but sold my extra several months back.  I look forward to seeing your post once you have finished.

I am very interested in that Foster. Please email me 

[url]stemmers37@att.net[/url]
Jim Rivera
